titles.title: To restrict passports of certain sex offenders, and for other purposes.
To restrict passports of certain sex offenders, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of State to revoke, restrict, or limit a passport issued to a sex offender who is included in the National Sex Offender Registry or is required to register in a jurisdiction's sex offender registry. Requires the Secretary to report to Congress on the number of passports revoked, restricted, or limited each year.
